roles.title: Senior Web Developer
description: Led development of client-side applications using modern architecture.
Mentored a team of 4 junior developers, improving code quality and team velocity.
Implemented a comprehensive WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility overhaul for all client projects.

roles.title: Web Developer
description: Developed key features for enterprise-level web applications using modern JavaScript and CSS.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to create responsive and intuitive interfaces.

roles.title: Data Entry Clerk
description: Responsible for accurately transferring and verifying data between multiple database systems.
Maintained a 99.8% data accuracy rate across all assigned projects.

roles.title: Games Operator
description: Engaged with park guests to provide a fun and friendly midway games experience.
Handled cash transactions and maintained prize inventory.

roles.title: Games Operator
description: Operated midway games in a high-traffic environment while providing excellent guest assistance.
